testcase.classname: User should verify the search hotel page
testcase.name: Verify User should enter all fields and verify select hotel page - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on OMR login page.............................................passed When User Login with valid "harikaransrinivasan172000@gmail.com" and "Greens@1234".passed Then User should verify the after Login "Welcome Harikaran".................passed When User should pass all the fields "Andhra Pradesh" , "Tirupati" , "Deluxe" , "2024-05-09" , "2024-05-10" , "1-One" , "1-One" and "2".passed Then User should verify after click the search and success message as "Select Hotel".passed
